fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- A Sentry Power must always spawn.
- Sentries may only visit authorized targets.
- Sentries don't know each others' roles or names. 
- No factional chat
- No factional kill

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Rid the town of any dissidents to the Sentries.

meta.inherit_fields: Goal:Rid the town of any dissidents to the Sentries.
